issue.title: Low frame rates on sensors with 1.8.6/2.6.5

content.raw:
Checking on @faller 's constellation machines, starting with sim:

~~~
ubuntu@sim-03:~$ rostopic hz /sandia_hands/r_hand/camera/left/image_raw
subscribed to [/sandia_hands/r_hand/camera/left/image_raw]
average rate: 30.100
        min: 0.032s max: 0.034s std dev: 0.00053s window: 19
average rate: 30.050
        min: 0.032s max: 0.034s std dev: 0.00061s window: 37
~~~
~~~
ubuntu@sim-03:~$ rostopic hz /multisense_sl/laser/scan -w 20
subscribed to [/multisense_sl/laser/scan]
average rate: 40.000
        min: 0.024s max: 0.026s std dev: 0.00046s window: 20
average rate: 40.000
        min: 0.024s max: 0.026s std dev: 0.00032s window: 20
~~~

And fc1:
~~~
ubuntu@fc1-03:~$ rostopic hz /sandia_hands/r_hand/camera/left/image_raw
subscribed to [/sandia_hands/r_hand/camera/left/image_raw]
average rate: 30.050
        min: 0.032s max: 0.034s std dev: 0.00056s window: 19
average rate: 30.008
        min: 0.032s max: 0.035s std dev: 0.00062s window: 38
~~~
~~~
ubuntu@fc1-03:~$ rostopic hz /multisense_sl/laser/scan -w 20
subscribed to [/multisense_sl/laser/scan]
average rate: 40.000
        min: 0.025s max: 0.025s std dev: 0.00000s window: 20
average rate: 40.000
        min: 0.025s max: 0.025s std dev: 0.00000s window: 20
~~~

And fc2:
~~~
ubuntu@fc2-03:~$ rostopic hz /sandia_hands/r_hand/camera/left/image_raw
subscribed to [/sandia_hands/r_hand/camera/left/image_raw]
average rate: 31.405
        min: 0.007s max: 0.035s std dev: 0.00593s window: 20
average rate: 30.705
        min: 0.007s max: 0.035s std dev: 0.00434s window: 38
~~~
~~~
ubuntu@fc2-03:~$ rostopic hz /multisense_sl/laser/scan -w 20
subscribed to [/multisense_sl/laser/scan]
average rate: 40.000
        min: 0.024s max: 0.026s std dev: 0.00046s window: 20
average rate: 40.000
        min: 0.025s max: 0.025s std dev: 0.00000s window: 20
~~~

That all looks correct to me.

Checking on @faller 's constellation machines, starting with sim:

ubuntu@sim-03:~$ rostopic hz /sandia_hands/r_hand/camera/left/image_raw
subscribed to [/sandia_hands/r_hand/camera/left/image_raw]
average rate: 30.100
        min: 0.032s max: 0.034s std dev: 0.00053s window: 19
average rate: 30.050
        min: 0.032s max: 0.034s std dev: 0.00061s window: 37

ubuntu@sim-03:~$ rostopic hz /multisense_sl/laser/scan -w 20
subscribed to [/multisense_sl/laser/scan]
average rate: 40.000
        min: 0.024s max: 0.026s std dev: 0.00046s window: 20
average rate: 40.000

average rate: 30.008

And fc2:

That all looks correct to me.
